nakulugamuwa kudawalla para hadanna di.ee. yojana kara kara hitapuwa oomare appuhamita hondata mathakaya.eewagema tharunayanta gowi sama hamudawak hada ee aya rakiyawalata bandawa gena dawase mul paya deka gowithan kara gurukamata ho lipikarakamata ho wani thama rakiyawata yama – busal 100ta wadiyen aswanna gath gowinta ran pawumak dima rate aanduwe wada piliwela gana uganwanna puhunu karanna deshapalana pasalak aarambha karanna 1954 – 55 paksha sammelanayata gampaha as.di.bandaranayaka manthi්rathuma samanga kala yojana ganada oomare appuhami ge mathakaya awadi karayi.oomare appuhamige mathakayata di.ee.rajapakshage wadimahal puthu nihanda, cham, shantha dantha piya menwu chamal amathithuma - hambanthota waraya guwanthota, mawuaara athulu waw hadamin karana meheya dewani puth mahinda rajapaksha rate raju washayen deshaya nidahas karagena parasathuru uwaduren midimata karana uthsahaya rata godanangimata ayiyala samanga ekwa sanwardhana katayuthu rajya niladharin meheyawamin basil rajapaksha karana meheya senadhinayaka ayiyatath anek sahodara waruntath sahaya wemin parasathuru uwadura durukirimata wehesana gotabhaya puthun karana meheya janathawa samanga kruthawediwa me samakalinayange sihiyata nangenu apa daka bala sitinne mahath santhoshayenya.eda pawathi aakarayath ada pawathina aakarayath mathuwata pawathiya yuthu aakarayath gana deshaye sanwardhanaye maha pimma aadhyathmika pibidima walawe mitiyawathen giruwayen rohanayen ratata pubuduwa layi.ithihasayata padam uganwana loka nayakayanta pawa guru aadarsha kota manga penwimata haki ki්rayakarakam sahitha athigaru janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma samanga wu sahodara pirisak dayada karadun di.ee.rajapaksha mathithumath ethumage aadaraniya mathiniyath bathiyen sihipath karamu.amarasinha kudagalaara manawa ha parisara sambandhatha pa්rawardhana kirime sanwidhanaya (help - oo) upasabhapathi ha niyojya widhayaka
